p: The BCYRN1 lncRNA listed as a 200 nt transcript in the Ensemble Genome Browser (ID: ENST00000418539.2, http://www.ensemble.org) [ 34]. The rs13388259 SNP is located within an untranscribed region downstream of the BC200 lncRNA and replaces adenine with cytosine (NG_012352.2:g.3538A>C). A binding site for the HNF4A transcription factor is located 236 nt upstream of the SNP, and a short interspersed nuclear element (AluSx) is located 73 nt downstream.
